SEARCH
Package view.viewGame

Class MovementsView

java.lang.Object
view.viewGame.MovementsView
public class MovementsView extends Object
MovementsView is a class that represents the view of the movements in the game. It contains methods to manage the movements of the hero in the level.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MovementsView(LocationView locationView)
    Constructor initializes the handlers for the movements of the hero

    • addHandlers

      public void addHandlers(MainScene scene)
      addHandlers is a method that adds the handlers to the scene. It is used to add the event handlers for the movements of the hero.
      Parameters:
      scene - the MainScene object

    • removeHandlers

      public void removeHandlers(MainScene scene)
      removeHandlers is a method that removes the handlers from the scene. It is used to remove the event handlers for the movements of the hero.
      Parameters:
      scene - the MainScene object
